lever.title: DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION FOR THE AGRI-FOOD SYSTEM
lever.description: The Bioversity & CIAT Alliance has developed tools to improve the yields and decision-making of more than 100,000 farmers through the development of tools for the collection, analysis of data and dissemination of information in a timely, practical and site-specific manner, with The objective of facilitating decision-making by producers and technicians on what, where, when and which agronomic practices to apply to obtain a sustainable production adapted to the climate.

title: THE COLLECTION OF
DATA
OF
data_collection.description: DERIVED FROM MODERN STRATEGIES FOR DATA CAPTURE (ICT, IoT, REMOTE PERCEPTION, ETC) AND ALLIANCES WITH EXISTING DATA.

impact.title: IMPACT
item: Greater adaptive capacity of agricultural systems to climate change

tool.title: TOOLS
tool.description: The team is constantly developing digital farming tools AND platforms. To know more about each one scroll down.

service.title: SERVICES
service.description: The activities carried out by the digital transformation team are established as means to achieve the progress of the agri-food system.
service.service_1: Development in implementation of workflows for cleaning and consolidation of information.
service.service_2: Data analysis using statistical and machine learning methods.
service.service_3: Visualization of information end users (technicians, producers, researchers in the agricultural sector).
service.service_4: Training in data mining applied to agriculture.

success_cases.title: SUCCESS CASES
success_cases.description: With more than 10 years of experience in digital agriculture, the team has managed to highlight its projects, be recognized by various entities and has generated an impact in the different territories where it has carried out its work.

media.title: MEDIA CONTENT
media.description: Then you will be able to see the webinars, videos, documentaries and other multimedia elements that the team has left on its journey.

article.title: ARTICLES
article.description: The team's work in the development of research published in various scientific journals has been important and enriching. Here below you will find the publications made.
